name: Henrik and the Angry Axe (TOJam 2016)
description:
TOJam 2016 was this past weekend and Lightning Rod Games made our first appearance as a team. This year's theme was "There will be Consequences."

As a bit of a break from the thoughtful, heart-warming game play of A Fold Apart, we decided to explore something new and make a game that's all about vanquishing your enemies!

Henrik is a moose-antlered Viking who needs to fight! His need is so strong that every time he dies, he is reborn alongside the ghosts of his past - who continue to fight by his side. But what happens when he attains his ultimate prize and the ghosts decide to claim their share?

Playable with keyboard & mouse, or game pad.

Keyboard controls: WASD to move, left and right click are primary and secondary attack respectively.

Game pad controls: left stick to move, X and Y are primary and secondary attack respectively.
